017package org.microbean.type;
018
019import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
020
021import java.lang.reflect.AnnotatedElement;
022
023/**
024 * A deliberately perverse {@link AnnotatedElement} implementation
025 * that reports no annotations by default.
026 *
027 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
028 * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
029 */
030public class UnannotatedElement implements AnnotatedElement {
031
032
033  /*
034   * Constructors.
035   */
036
037
038  /**
039   * Creates a new {@link UnannotatedElement}.
040   */
041  public UnannotatedElement() {
042    super();
043  }
044
045
046  /*
047   * Instance methods.
048   */
049
050
051  /**
052   * Returns an empty {@link Annotation} array.
053   *
054   * @return an emtpy {@link Annotation} array
055   *
056   * @nullability This method does not and its overrides must not
057   * return {@code null}.
058   *
059   * @threadsafety This method is and its overrides must be safe for
060   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
061   *
062   * @idempotency This method is and its overrides must be idempotent
063   * and deterministic.
064   */
065  @Override
066  public Annotation[] getAnnotations() {
067    return AbstractType.EMPTY_ANNOTATION_ARRAY.clone();
068  }
069
070  /**
071   * Returns {@code null} when invoked with any argument.
072   *
073   * @return {@code null}
074   *
075   * @nullability This method does and its overrides can return {@code
076   * null}.
077   *
078   * @threadsafety This method is and its overrides must be safe for
079   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
080   *
081   * @idempotency This method is and its overrides must be idempotent
082   * and deterministic.
083   */
084  @Override
085  public <T extends Annotation> T getAnnotation(final Class<T> annotationClass) {
086    return null;
087  }
088
089  /**
090   * Returns an empty {@link Annotation} array.
091   *
092   * @return an emtpy {@link Annotation} array
093   *
094   * @nullability This method does not and its overrides must not
095   * return {@code null}.
096   *
097   * @threadsafety This method is and its overrides must be safe for
098   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
099   *
100   * @idempotency This method is and its overrides must be idempotent
101   * and deterministic.
102   */
103  @Override
104  public Annotation[] getDeclaredAnnotations() {
105    return AbstractType.EMPTY_ANNOTATION_ARRAY.clone();
106  }
107
108}
